abstract.p: Eight teens at Leake & Watts Services youth center in Yonkers, NY, are charged with breaking into campus high school and smashing computers, windows and fax machines; child care counselor Wayne Cordon is arraigned on homicide and assault charges in connection with March 2 automobile accident that killed passenger, student at school (S)

block.p: Eight teenagers at Leake & Watts Services, a youth center in Yonkers, have been charged with breaking into the campus high school and smashing 27 computers, some windows and fax machines. Meanwhile, the Westchester District Attorney's office said that a child care counselor, Wayne Cordon, 26, has been arraigned on charges of criminally negligent homicide and assault in connection with an automobile accident on March 2 that killed his 17-year-old passenger, a student at the school. New York City and Westchester officials have suspended referrals to Leake & Watts, while investigating its hiring practices.
